subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: this plugin allows to display public information as publicdasbhoard about a user such as his comments, different counters on his activities or simply his name, avatar, etc.

subsection.name: Configuration
subsection.p: A module must implement each publicdashboard you want to display. In the properties file, dashboard.encrypt.userid is used to encrypt or not the userid In the backoffice, you can decide which publicdashboard you want to add.

subsection.name: Usage
subsection.p: The publicdashboard page is accessible via the Portal in Front Office
